bread: As the only UX designer in the design team, I created the core design value, interaction guideline and shipped the product withinn three months.
Worked as a lead experience expert with Huawei/Honor and rebuilt their brand identity and create a strategic roadmap that empower their inhouse product team to have sustainable growth.
Worked as a UX designer and researcher that created the number one rated zero fee cryptocurrency exchange and won the Red Dot design award in 2018.
Created a new generation hypertension meter that not only assist patients control their blood pressure but empower people to create a healthy lifestyle.

Created passenger journey and traveler personas to highlight the painpoints of HSR passenger, this research was adapted both by THSR and the passenger information displayer system manufacturing company Delta Electronic, Inc.
Established the first UX forum at Rakuten internatioinal that delivered user experience knowledge, workshops and introduced research methods.
Worked as a lead designer in responsible for the start page and an incubating project to enable fashion customers discover and develop their unique style.
